summary: The code downloads a JSON file containing lyrics from an API endpoint, then extracts the lyrics using a separate script. The goal is to obtain the "lrc" part of the lyrics.

details.comment: The code downloads a JSON file containing lyrics from an API endpoint, then extracts the lyrics using a separate script. The goal is to obtain the "lrc" part of the lyrics.
details.content:
curl -L -o some_lyrics.json http://localhost:4000/lyric?id=33894312
python3 extract_lyrics_from_netease_json.py some_lyrics.json
# just want the "lrc" part.
